ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class containing all robot movement related behaviors. Extends Thread.
    Author:
    Volen Mihaylov, Patrick Ghazal, Bryan Jay

    • Method Detail

      • setLocalizers

        public void setLocalizers()
        Sets localizers instances. Called from the Controller class.

      • travelToAdvGrid

        public void travelToAdvGrid(double gridX,
                            double gridY,
                            boolean firstY)
                     throws OdometerExceptions,
                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Travel to a point of the grid, while localizing at each grid line, by moving along one axis at a time
        Parameters:
        gridX - x-coordinate of the destination (in grid units)
        gridY - y-coordinate of the destination (in grid units)
        firstY - travel along the y axis first if true
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • travelToAdvGridX

        private void travelToAdvGridX(double gridX,
                              double currX)
                       throws OdometerExceptions,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Travel to a certain x-coordinate, at the same y-coordinate, while localizing at each grid line
        Parameters:
        gridX - x-coordinate of the destination (in grid units)
        currX - current x-position (in real distances)
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • travelToAdvGridY

        private void travelToAdvGridY(double gridY,
                              double currY)
                       throws OdometerExceptions,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Travel to a certain y-coordinate, at the same x-coordinate, while localizing at each grid line
        Parameters:
        gridY - y-coordinate of the destination (in grid units)
        currY - current y-position (in real distances)
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • travelToAdv

        public void travelToAdv(double gridX,
                        double gridY)
                 throws OdometerExceptions,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        Deprecated. Since version 06.07.00
        Travel to a point of the grid, while localizing at each grid line, by moving along the y and x axis in that order
        Parameters:
        gridX - x-coordinate of the destination (in grid units)
        gridY - y-coordinate of the destination (in grid units)
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
                     double y)
        A method to drive our vehicle to a certain Cartesian coordinate by going directly to it. No localization is done in this method.
        Parameters:
        x - X-Coordinate of destination
        y - Y-Coordinate of destination

      • rotateByDistance

        public void rotateByDistance(double dist,
                             int leftWheelDir,
                             int rightWheelDir)
        Travels a certain distance, in a certain direction.
        Parameters:
        dist - distance to travel
        leftWheelDir - 1 for the left wheel to go forward, -1 for backward
        rightWheelDir - 1 for the right wheel to go forward, -1 for backward

      • rotateByAngle

        public void rotateByAngle(double degrees,
                          int leftWheelDir,
                          int rightWheelDir)
        Turn by a certain angle in a certain direction
        Parameters:
        degrees - angle to turn
        leftWheelDir - 1 for the left wheel to go forward, -1 for backward
        rightWheelDir - 1 for the right wheel to go forward, -1 for backward

      • isNavigating

        boolean isNavigating()
              throws OdometerExceptions
        A method to determine whether another thread has called navigation methods.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the robot is on the move
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions
